channel.title: Go on Sam Martin
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Sam Martin

item.title: Mondo, YNAB, and an Intro to Go
item.description: Go I’ve been wanting to get into Go for a while. Despite the logo it’s a very respectable open source project developed by a team at Google that “makes it easy to build simple, reliable, and efficient software”. Crucially, Go is a cross-platform, compiled language that’s used notably by the HashiCorp suite of products. That means that if I want to contribute modules to say, Terraform (and I do) I need to know Go well enough to write decent, tested code that will get accepted in a pull request.
